text: María Antonieta Gómez Rodríguez (born 22 December 1950), more commonly known by her stage name María Antonieta de las Nieves, is a Mexican actress, comedienne, and singer. She is known for her role as La Chilindrina in the Mexican sitcom El Chavo del Ocho.Biographical Dictionary of Mexican Film Performers "N" and "O", Retrieved January 4, 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * *La Chilindrina – Official website *Maria's bio @ Chespirito.org *see Maria's work on the shows Chavo del 8 and others by Chespirito *María Antonieta de las Nieves on Telemundo Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican comedians Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Singers from Mexico City Category:People from Nayarit
title: María Antonieta de las Nieves
